Improve each shining Hour,
And gather Honey all the day
From every opening Flower!" -Isaac Watts. 1715.}} ==Useful Info== '''Bumblebees''' are larger, slower versions of [[killer bee]]s. They deal twice as much damage and more [[poison]] with their stings, have double the [[HP]], and are worth triple the [[XP]]. Fortunately, they're much slower, have less [[EV]], and are still just as susceptible to [[poison]]. They can occasionally be found in [[the Lair]], but thankfully not in the huge swarms killer bees tend to appear in. ==Tips & Tricks== *Poison and confusion are very effective against them. ==History== Bumblebees were removed in [[0.12]]. Prior to [[0.11]], their description consisted merely of one very memorable phrase: {{Flavour|A very large and fat hairy bee.}} [[Category:Obsolete monsters]]
